description:
Validate email address. Key features:
1. Checks that an email address has the correct syntax
1. Gives friendly error messages when validation fails.
1. Checks deliverability of an email address.
1. Supports internationalized domain names and 
1. Normalizes email addresses
name: email_validator._email_validator_validate

description: Email Address Validator - Superior email validation with advanced syntax checking, friendly error messaging for better user experience, guaranteed delivery check to ensure your emails reach their destination without fail. Stand out from the crowd by leveraging our support for complex international domains like example.user@xn--fiq228c.com and ensuring each address is not just syntactically correct but also poised for successful communication.
